long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces your New Tab with a lil' app to help you track multiple timezones.

To try it out on the web visit https://mrwolf.app

No Tracking. 100% Free and Open Source.

Source code available at https://github.com/beauallison/mrWolf/

[Update 0.1.1]

Small update to add better support for users of 12 hour time
- Available in Settings, the ability to display am/pm

[Update: 0.1.0]

Added two new features, available in Settings
- A simple checklist
- The ability to increase and decrease font size
